select seq_aboardNo.nextval from dual
insert into aboard(aboardNo, clubId, memberId, aboardVal, title, aboardDate, boardContent ) values(#{aboardNo}, #{clubId}, #{memberId}, #{aboardVal}, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{boardContent})

insert into aVote(voteNo, aboardNo, voteTitle, vote1, vote2, vote3, vote4, vote5, totalNum, finDate) values(seq_voteNo.nextval, #{aboardNo}, #{voteTitle}, #{vote1}, #{vote2}, #{vote3}, #{vote4}, #{vote5}, #{totalNum}, #{finDate})
mapper.select: select voteNo, aboardNo, voteTitle, vote1, vote2, vote3, totalNum, finDate from aVote where aboardNo = #{aboardNo}
